⚡️ Monad Devnet is Coming Soon ⚡️

@monad_xyz has teased "devnet soon", but what does this mean?

Devnet is a running, real-time internal environment of both Monad’s Consensus & Execution stacks.

Read on to learn the specifics, and how this relates to testnet and mainnet 👇🧵 https://t.co/EFjXkyPH4V

🪓THURSDAY PURGEDAY 🪓

25 members are being PURGED from the Monad private telegram...

which means 25 spots are open 👀

want an invite? join the "tg-submissions" channel in the Monad Discord 🤝 https://t.co/DKjZxmt1t2
Highly scalable infrastructure unlocks new use cases https://t.co/iXSFeeg6Iv

PSA: there is an increasing number of impersonators pretending to be @monad_xyz

Use caution: always double check usernames 

We will not ask you to connect a wallet or share personal information https://t.co/ObUavTOFoj

the devs just started cheering

what could it mean

Monad is excited to announce an integration with @axelarnetwork to enable day 1 cross-chain support!

This integration will unlock crucial interoperability between dapps built on Monad and the 55+ chains & ecosystems Axelar connects

This is only the beginning… stay tuned for… https://t.co/P0AaUnko9Q

Want to build on Monad?

EVM bytecode and RPC compatibility means that you can build on an Ethereum testnet and deploy when Monad is live 🤝
https://t.co/WljZwirE5n

Expected hardware requirements to run a Monad full node:

CPU: 16 core CPU
Memory: 32 GB RAM
Storage: 2 TB NVMe SSD
Bandwidth: 100 Mb/s

You can buy a computer with these specs at CostCo Wholesale
